item.title: Cancer stole her voice. AI, curse words and children's books saved it

item.title: Summer surge in COVID cases appears to have begun, epidemiologists say
item.description: This summer's COVID-19 surge appears to have begun, according to the latest data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
